With this function you can retrieve the XBox Live reputation score for the given user ID pointer.
The user ID (a pointer) of the user to check

{ANY_CODE} var _a = 0;
var _num = xboxlive_get_user_count();
for (var i = 0; i < _num; ++i;)
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}var _uid = xboxlive_get_user(i);
{nbsp_x4}if _uid != pointer_null
{nbsp_x8}{
{nbsp_x8}global.UserName[_a] = xboxlive_gamedisplayname_for_user(_uid);
{nbsp_x8}global.UserScore[_a] = xboxlive_gamerscore_for_user(_uid);
{nbsp_x8}global.UserRep[_a] = xboxlive_reputation_for_user(_uid);
{nbsp_x8}global.UserAvatar[_a] = xboxlive_sprite_add_from_gamerpicture(_uid, 256, 0, 0);
{nbsp_x8}++a;
{nbsp_x8}}
{nbsp_x4}}
The above code loops through the logged in users and stores their gamer data in various global arrays.
